item.title: Npc Adder
item.dc:creator: @Crazycrud121 Crazycrud121
item.description:
@Crazycrud121 wrote:

Hey :D,
I have been trying to make a server for the last week…
I have had no luck and I don’t understand that Tut’s at all… Do you think you could possibly teach me how to make a server… Using either Hamachi, or No-ip… I would prefer No-Ip but if we have to do Hamachi i am fine…

   I really need help making one or at least learning how to make one........ I will do anything.... please help me

Help me please…

  • Ahhhh my Own Private Server :rolleyes:
